\n To obtain your AiAnswer API acce:
To obtain your AiAnswer API access token, follow these steps below:
      1. Log in to your AiAnswer account at https://app.aianswer.us .
      2. Navigate to Settings < API Key.
      3. Click on Copy icon to copy your existing Key or click on New API Key to create a new one.
      4. Copy the API Key and paste it below in "AiAnswer API Key".
get the lists of agents with Gmail: 使用 Gmail 获取代理人列表
Fetch Call details by Call ID: 通过呼叫ID获取呼叫详情
Schedule a call with an agent: 安排一个与代理人的来电
Fetch the transcript of a call by Call I: 通过通话ID获取通话记录
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Enter the phone number, along with count: 输入电话号码和国家代码的格式(例如+919867654310)
Optional details with key-value pairs (e: 键值对的可选详细信息 (例如customer_id，优先级)
Time to schedule the call in YYYY-MM-DD: 以YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS格式安排呼叫的时间。
Timezone of the scheduled call (e.g., As: 预定通话时区(例如亚洲/卡尔克塔)
Optional prospect details with key-value: 键值对的可选前景详情 (例如customer_id, priority)
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
